channel.title: CVE Feed for elvexys -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for elvexys -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-4780|2024-08-03T01:48:40.472Z -- elvexys -- isos
item.description: ISOS firmwares from versions 1.81 to 2.00 contain hardcoded credentials from embedded StreamX installer that integrators are not forced to change.

item.title: CVE-2022-4778|2024-08-03T01:48:40.415Z -- elvexys -- streamx
item.description: StreamX applications from versions 6.02.01 to 6.04.34 are affected by a path traversal vulnerability that allows authenticated users to get unauthorized access to files on the server's filesystem. StreamX applications using StreamView HTML component with the public web server feature activated are affected.

item.title: CVE-2022-4779|2024-08-03T01:48:40.434Z -- elvexys -- streamx
item.description: StreamX applications from versions 6.02.01 to 6.04.34 are affected by a logic bug that allows to bypass the implemented authentication scheme. StreamX applications using StreamView HTML component with the public web server feature activated are affected.
